extDescription.message: Browser extension that lets you synchronize the scrolling position of multiple tabs

noSearchFound.message: Unable to find any tabs matching your search

errorLoadTabsFailed.message: Failed to load tabs. Please refresh the extension.

errorStartSyncFailed.message: Failed to start synchronization. Please try again.

errorStopSyncFailed.message: Warning: Failed to properly stop sync. Local state has been cleared.

errorSwitchTabFailed.message: Failed to switch to tab. The tab may have been closed.

errorMinTabsRequired.message: Please select at least 2 tabs to synchronize.

ineligibleWebStore.message: Web store pages cannot be synchronized due to security restrictions

ineligibleGoogleServices.message: Google services pages have restrictions that prevent synchronization

ineligibleBrowserInternal.message: Browser internal pages cannot be synchronized due to security restrictions

ineligibleSpecialProtocol.message: Special protocol pages cannot be synchronized

ineligibleSecurityRestriction.message: This page cannot be synchronized due to security restrictions
